definitions: going or being transported from place to place

examples.text: a traveling exhibition of Dutch 17th-century masterpieces
she worked as a fire-eater in a traveling circus
I don't have any traveling expenses

definitions: accompanying or used by a person who travels

examples.text: my traveling companion and I spent the next day exploring
this kit is small enough to fit into traveling bags

definitions: the action or activity of going from one place to another, typically over a distance of some length

examples.text: one thing I've learned from traveling is that you have to respect other countries
music, films, and traveling are among her favourite pastimes

shortDefinitions: action of going from one place to another

definitions: the action of taking more than the allowed number of steps (typically two) while holding the ball without dribbling it, treated as a violation

examples.text: Arizona turned the ball back over, but then with nine seconds left, Scott was called for traveling

shortDefinitions: action of taking more than allowed number of steps while holding ball
